short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage your color palette, keep your color code close to you to save time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🧑‍🎨 You’re a designer and you need to store your palette to copy paste ?

🎨 You’re creating your own color palette and you need to experiment and see how it looks ?

🫶 All you need is Palette Maker !

📌 Keep the color you use always close to you in your browser (as if they were your little babies)

- Edit the color frame with your own colors
- Click the color frame to copy the color code (hexadecimal)
- Create your own color palette and see how it looks
